channel.title: MITB/MSCP Ultima Online Server
channel.description:
Let's do it, bitches.
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ultima_Online
Best MMO ever, easy-to-modify gameplay (server is completely modular and scriptable, game does nearly everything on the server, resulting in gameplay being dynamic as fuck), and badass lots of fluff and fun!
Discuss.
EDIT:
For those of you who are interested in giving the game a spin before you decide, i've set up a local server from home. To access, do this:
1. Download client: http://web.cdn.eamythic.com/us/uo/installers/20101118/UOClassicSetup_7_0_10_3.exe 2. Install the client on URL above, but DO NOT START THE GAME AFTER INSTALL. 3. Download Razor: http://www.runuo.com/razor/Razor_Latest.exe 4. Now, run Razor, it should auto-detect your UO directory and be ready to go. 5. Enter the following information: IP: 62.119.186.48 Port: 2593 6. PLAY!
When you get into UO, just login with any username/password and an account will be auto-created.
HAV FUN

item.title: MITB/MSCP Ultima Online Server
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:134, topic:387225”][quote author=Mendorphins link=topic=483027.msg3543201#msg3543201 date=1301008241]

Then I wouldn’t be interested. I barely know Java let alone learning a new language.

I barely know C#, but fiddling around with scripts, I had little trouble understanding them.
The languages are quite like eachother.

I guess I should at least take a look then.
[/quote]http://svn.runuo.com/RunUO-2.1-R605.zip That’s the build of RunUO we’re running.

For scripting you can go through Scripts included in this package, as well as utilize these scripting support forums: http://runuo.com/community/forums/tutorials.66/

Running the server is piss easy, and with Razor you just connect to localhost when it’s running. Basically, your own UO-sandbox environment takes little to no time to set up, and scripting is piece of cake. Have fun![/quote]
Sounds brilliant in black and white - I bet I can stumble across a problem though and make things harder than they seem. Will take a proper look in the morning, been up 36 hours…

Read full topic

item.title: MITB/MSCP Ultima Online Server
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:133, topic:387225”][quote author=sppt link=topic=483027.msg3542472#msg3542472 date=1300960745]

Then I wouldn’t be interested. I barely know Java let alone learning a new language.

I barely know C#, but fiddling around with scripts, I had little trouble understanding them.
The languages are quite like eachother.
[/quote]
I guess I should at least take a look then.[/quote]http://svn.runuo.com/RunUO-2.1-R605.zip That’s the build of RunUO we’re running.

For scripting you can go through Scripts included in this package, as well as utilize these scripting support forums: http://runuo.com/community/forums/tutorials.66/

Running the server is piss easy, and with Razor you just connect to localhost when it’s running. Basically, your own UO-sandbox environment takes little to no time to set up, and scripting is piece of cake. Have fun!

Read full topic
